title: A detailed interpretation of a dream about a dead person crying

preview.html: We present to you the interpretation of a dream about a dead person crying in a dream, as reported by many Arab writers and translators. Seeing a dead person crying in a dream revolves around the state of the dead person. If he cries in a faint voice, this indicates what is almost good that the dreamer will gain, and if he cries loudly, this indicates the approaching sadness. In this article, we will talk about a dead person crying in a dream and with a number of interpretation scholars, so follow us in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person crying by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin narrated that if the sleeper sees a dead person crying, then his screaming is loud, so he tortures this dead person and asks God for forgiveness for him. As for If his screams are without a sound, this indicates that he is in Paradise, God willing. It was also mentioned that if the dead person is the husband of the sleeping woman, then he will become angry with her and do what he does not like. Interpretation of the dead crying in a dream according to Al-NabulsiAl-Nabulsi narrated that if he sees the deceased in a dream, this indicates the extent of affection. That was standing between them. If he sees him crying quietly, and his appearance is beautiful, then this indicates the good condition of the deceased, God willing. If he sees him crying with tears only and without a low sound, then this indicates the dreamer’s sadness about something in his life, which he must search for and try to fix. If the dead person cries loudly and is in pain, this indicates his torment in the afterlife, so let him give alms on his behalf. But if the husband sees his wife dead in a dream, this means that she blames him for things he does that make her angry. But if the wife sees her dead husband crying in her dream, this indicates that he is angry with her because She did it or did it before, so she asks God for forgiveness and gives charity on behalf of her husband. Dead people crying in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq mentioned that if the dreamer sees a dead person crying in a dream, then he is walking in the path of the dead. It can be interpreted as sadness over what has passed in this world, or because of fear of torment in the world. Hereafter, he gives alms on behalf of the dead. If one or both of his deceased parents sees crying in a dream, this indicates their need for good deeds, so he should supplicate and give zakat on their behalf. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person crying over the living. Some commentators said: If the dreamer sees in a dream that a dead person is crying over him, This is evidence of judging the living, so let him be patient and ask for reward. If the dead cry over the living in a low voice, this indicates the arrival of goodness, God willing. But if she cries over him in a loud voice, this indicates that the living is committing sins, which is essentially disobedience to his parents. Interpretation of the death of a father crying in... Seeing a deceased father in a dream speaking with tears means that the dreamer is going through experience and sadness. If he realizes that his father is crying for him in the dream, this indicates that he is committing sins and that his father is mourning for him. It may also indicate that the dreamer longs to meet his father, so he is patient and asks for reward. And it is true about him. A dead person crying in a dream for an unmarried woman. If an unmarried woman sees that her dead father is crying in her dream, this indicates heartbreak, so she should be patient and consider it. If the crying is low-pitched and the dead person is in full view, God willing, then this indicates the goodness of the relative, and it may be money or prestige. Or a husband. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person crying for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that her father is crying, this indicates

title: Interpretation of a dream about wearing perfume and perfume in a dream

preview.html: Seeing perfume in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a man, the smell of oud oil, the smell of musk, the smell of oud for Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, and al-Nabulsi and others. Jurists say that the interpretation of a dream about seeing perfume in a dream is one of the good dreams, and if an unmarried woman sees perfume in a dream, it is evidence of satisfying desire, and if she sees perfume in a dream, this is evidence of goodness and livelihood, and the interpretation of the vision differs from one person to another. Interpretation of perfumes in a dream Interpretation of a dream about seeing perfumes by Ibn Shaheen: Ibn Sirin said a fragrant vision, if the smell of perfume is from the world, it is interpreted as an increase in knowledge and profit from it, and if it is rich, it increases wealth and people benefit from it. On it. That it is perfumed, this indicates praise for him from people. And whoever sees that he sold people something adulterated, then he showed them a good appointment, then he turns between them with good and good. As for the vision of a perfumed woman, it is interpreted from five aspects: the desire of the world, or a beautiful woman, praise, kindness, grace and pleasure. Religiously, and his injury to it is his injury to her religion. In general, the dream of perfume is interpreted through nine aspects: good praise, words of truth, useful knowledge, good nature, the council of knowledge, the generous man and his words, the man of modesty and reverence and the precious religion. Interpretation of perfumes in a dream by Ibn Sirin The good news about perfumes in a dream has many interpretations according to the opinion of interpreters and translators, and among the most important interpreters is Ibn Sirin, as he interpreted the vision of perfume as if he smells a scent from the world, so it is. It is interpreted as an increase in knowledge and acquisition from it, and if it is rich, wealth increases and people benefit from it. Smell, then a good appearance and benefit appear to the extent of this. And whoever sees that he is perfumed, this indicates people's praise of him. He sits in one place, people's praise of him appears and his good reputation among them with kindness and praise. Or keep it. And whoever sees a woman with thick perfume, he interpreted it as religious, and harming him with it is his injury to her religion. In general, the vision of perfumes is interpreted from nine aspects: praise, words of truth, useful knowledge, good nature, a council of knowledge, a generous man, the words of a man of modesty and reverence, a precious religion and good news. Interpretation of perfumes in a dream for a single woman If an unmarried girl sees in her dream a man carrying musk, this is evidence of her marriage to a righteous man who fears God and lives with him in happiness and contentment, and puts an attractive and beautiful scent on her clothes. This is evidence that he will soon travel for work or study, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. Interpretation of perfumes in a dream for a married woman If a married woman dreams that her husband buys her perfume and gives it to her as a gift, this is evidence of how much her husband loves her, and that this lady is stable and happy in her life. I know. Interpretation of perfumes in a dream for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman dreams that her husband is selling her perfume, this is evidence of an easy and natural birth, and that this woman will give birth to her male child. Interpretation of perfumes in a dream for a divorced woman If a divorced woman sees a sick person in a dream applying perfume, this is evidence of

title: Interpretation of a dream about walking on wet ground in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about walking on wet ground in a dream When searching for the interpretation of a dream about walking on wet ground in a dream, one of the dreams that many wanted to know is the interpretation of this dream. Anyone who dreams of walking on wet ground can indicate positive changes that occurred in his life at that time. It could be that a person dreamed that he was walking On wet ground is a sign that dreams and aspirations will come true with God’s grace. Whoever dreams that he is walking on land filled with water, this may indicate longevity and enjoyment of good health. In the event that a person sees that he is walking on wet ground, this may indicate happy events that will come For the dreamer, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about walking on desert sand in a dream: We find that walking on desert sand in a dream may indicate that the person with insight will be exposed to some major disturbances in his life. Seeing him walking on sand in the desert may indicate the isolation that the dreamer is entering at this time, and by God I know. If a person sees himself walking on the desert sand, this may indicate his need to work with others during this time. In the case of my personal opinion, that he was walking on the desert sand, this may indicate the abundance of money that the dreamer obtains at that time, by God. I know. Interpretation of a dream about walking on sea rocks in a dream: If someone sees that he was walking on sea rocks, this may indicate that he spent a lot of money during that period. A dream about walking on sea rocks in a dream may indicate some big changes occurring in that person’s life. Period. Whoever sees in his dream that he was walking on the rocks of the sea, it may be a sign of the dreamer’s interest in some positive things in her life during those days. Interpretation of a dream about walking with blood in a dream: Anyone who dreams of walking on blood could be a sign of the dreamer’s bad deeds and must repent for them. God is Blessed and Almighty. Dreaming of walking on blood in a dream may indicate some obstacles and problems present in one’s life during this period. If one sees that he is walking on blood, this may be a sign of some illicit money that the dreamer was obtaining at that time, and God I know. If a person sees that he is walking on blood, it may be a sign of sins and disobedience committed by the dreamer in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about walking without touching the ground in a dream. Anyone who sees in his dream that he is walking high can indicate dreams that he wants to reach. To her at that time Walking without touching the ground in a dream may indicate the good that the dreamer will gain in those days. Seeing him walking without touching the ground in a dream may indicate major changes occurring to the dreamer during those days. In the event that one sees that he was walking without touching the ground In a dream, this may indicate the dreamer’s happiness and old joys at that time, thanks to God. title: Interpretation of a dream about a snake: seeing a yellow, black, white, green, red snake

preview.html: We present to you the vision of a small live black snake, a large snake, a single black snake, married, pregnant, divorced, male, Ibn Sirin. The snake in a dream is considered one of the most frightening dreams, as the snake is one of the most poisonous animals and causes fear and panic to the dreamer during his sleep. Through our topic today, we will discuss the interpretation of seeing a snake in detail in a dream according to the opinions of interpreters. Whoever sees a snake in his house, then the enemy is from his house, and if he is wild, then the enemy is a stranger, and if he has legs, then this will be interpreted by the strength of the enemy. And whoever dreams that he killed a snake, then he will conquer his enemy, and his flesh, bones, skin, and blood are the enemy’s money, and vice versa. And whoever sees that his words are Live with good words, it is interpreted as the appearance of goodness and benefit. Perhaps it will be interpreted as the appearance of the topic of joy and happiness. If he sees otherwise, then his statement is against it, and in the end the matter is in safety. And whoever sees that the snake obeys him and throws it wherever he wants, it is interpreted that he acquires glory, prestige, and grace. And whoever sees a metal snake, it is better. If it is made of gold or silver, it is more eloquent. Interpretation of snakes according to the color of the snake. Whoever sees a white snake and picks it up, it is interpreted as progress. The snake is black and there are small snakes around it because it is interpreted as increasing decency and blackness. Seeing a green snake indicates two enemies, so beware of them. Seeing a yellow snake indicates an enemy who has illness. Weakness: Seeing a red snake indicates an enemy of a clan. Snakes are enemies, and the snake may be a ruler or the wife may be a child, as God Almighty says: “Some of your women and children are your enemies, so beware of them.” “Whoever fights a snake or fights it fights an enemy, and if he kills it, his enemy wins. If he is bitten, his enemy hates him and he eats its flesh. Money from the enemy, pleasure and bliss, despite a bite of half the enemy’s half, and from his living words, with kind words and kindness, there is goodness that is admired by the world from him. Interpretation of a snake in a dream by Ibn Siriniri, the translator, the great Sheikh Ibn Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a snake in a dream symbolizes the dreamer’s misfortune and is one of the unwanted dreams. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a snake symbolizes evil, lack of religion, and distance from God Almighty. Also, seeing the dreamer injured by a snake in a dream indicates troubles and disasters that the dreamer will face. It is an indication of the enemy’s victory over him. Seeing snake eggs for the dreamer also symbolizes the harm that he will suffer at the hands of his enemy. Also, seeing panic and fear of a snake in the dreamer’s dream shows the dreamer’s fear in reality of people who want to harm him, and God Almighty is Most High and All-Knowing. As for It is good to see a snake in a dream, according to what the translator Ibn Sirin sees. Seeing the killing or death of a snake is one of the desired dreams that symbolizes getting rid of enemies and evil. Also, seeing a snake brings good news, and the dreamer will attain happiness and a close marriage, and God Almighty is Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing a snake cooking and eating it in a dream indicates kindness, and God knows best. Interpretation of a snake in a dream for

title: The meaning of a job in a dream is symbols of work

preview.html: The meaning of work in a dream for a single woman. Death: Seeing death is a transition and change in status and means that you will get a job. Daughter: If the girl is unmarried and sees that she has given birth to a daughter, then this is livelihood, and she can find work. Marriage: If you wait for a job and see yourself getting married, you will get On the job. Employment contract: means that goals or desires will be fulfilled, especially if it contains sufficient conditions and details. Contracts: If you are already waiting for a job or applying for a job, here the contract means that you will get this job. Marriage: If in your dream you sign an employment contract With a specific person, it means your marriage. Illness: If you dream of having a job, this may be a sign of a physical illness that is bothering you. Signs of a married woman’s dream job: The luckiest married woman in a dream about work, if the woman is really a worker, symbolizes an improvement in social status, If she excels in her work in reality, then seeing the job means promoting her to a higher rank, but if he sees the job as if it were signing an employment contract, then this is an indication of an increase in salary or monthly income. A married woman who is a housewife “does not work.” If she sees a job in a dream and signs contracts, it may mean that she has heard happy news or perhaps bad news that will benefit her husband. But if a married woman is looking for a job, seeing “green” grapes means that she will find a job soon. Job, and if you see that your husband married you, you will get the job for which you applied. In reality, if a woman marries another man from her husband, and is waiting for a job, he will get it by God’s command. The symbol of work in a dream for a manIf you get married in a dream and see the bride, then the bride means your new job A job in a man’s dream means losing a job in reality. A job may indicate that you will suffer physical harm. If you are not an “unemployed” worker, then this vision means that you are not afraid of anything. If you see that the job was taken by Someone other than you, then this is a sign of your loss. The symbol of work in a dream. The signs of a job in a dream are food and goodness from God Almighty for you, so if he sees, for example, that you enter a gold store and buy walls, then this is livelihood that could be a job. A “necklace” made of gold in your dream means that the date of signing the employment contract is approaching. The first site of Shamloul in the Arab world offers a free interpretation of visions and dreams, just leave a message and we will respond as quickly as possible.

title: A black scorpion sting in a man’s dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a black scorpion sting in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that there was a scorpion that stung her and she fainted. This indicates that this girl will suffer from an illness in the coming period and will recover from it after a long time. When an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she was stung by a scorpion She did not feel any pain after the sting. This vision shows that this girl is strong in life and faces problems on her own. Soon she will be freed from all the sorrows and fears that she suffers from. There is an interpretation that says that the scorpion sting is for an unmarried girl. It shows that there are bad friends in her life and she did not realize it, And they are trying to destroy her without her knowledge. Seeing an unmarried girl in her dream who was stung by a scorpion and died after she was stung. This means that he will live long and live long. And the dreams that she had and her desires will come true. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a black scorpion for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing a black scorpion sting in a dream for a woman Married Woman: When a married woman sees in her dream that a black scorpion has stung her, that woman also cried in the dream. This means that the woman lives an unhappy and bad life with her husband and does not love him. She tries to divorce him and he lives a depressing life full of sadness. The sting of a black scorpion in a married woman’s dream indicates Indicates that she will lose the one she loves and will cry a lot for him in the coming days. This dream is also interpreted as the presence of people who do not love her well and are destroying her without her knowledge and she must be careful. If a married woman sees in a dream a scorpion that stings black, then its color will turn white. This It means that he will put an end to all the problems and difficult circumstances that he is going through. Soon he will start a new life without sorrows, circumstances and fears. The interpretation of a dream about a scorpion sting for a married woman is that she is unfit and does not take care of her home and children and does not raise them on morals and ethics. Interpretation of seeing a black scorpion sting in a dream for a man and its meaning when A man dreams that he was stung by a scorpion and did not feel any pain. This means that there are companions who do not accept him and are tarnishing his reputation among people, and they do not love him and he does not know it, and he must warn them and take care of them. Seeing a black scorpion in his dream and it stings that man. It indicates the problems that he will face in the future. Life, difficulties and bad circumstances that control you. There is an interpretation that says that a black scorpion sting for a man indicates the death of someone close to them. If someone sees in his dream a scorpion sting, and the scorpion is large, then it stings him and he dies immediately. This means that he will hear bad news in his life and will go through a crisis. Difficult finances. He will face a difficult time in his life in the coming days. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about a black scorpion for a divorced woman. The meaning of seeing a black scorpion sting in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Seeing a pregnant woman in her dream who was stung by a scorpion and was very tired during pregnancy. This shows that she will survive her pregnancy and her birth will be difficult. She will suffer from pregnancy and will have to take care of herself. When a pregnant woman sees a black scorpion sting in a dream and cries in the dream, this indicates that she will lose her fetus and will not complete her pregnancy in the coming period, and God knows best. The woman saw

title: Interpretation of leprosy in a dream Seeing leprosy in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: A dream about leprosy for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a married or unmarried man, if a large gecko kills a small gecko, the leprosy that chased me, attacked me. Leprosy in a dream is one of the frightening and very frightening dreams for the dreamer, which causes us extreme terror when we see it. Leprosy is one of the insects that the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, called for. We have to kill because it harms the dreamer a lot and causes complete pollution of food and drink, and whoever kills it will attain many good deeds by saving people from its evil and great harm to one’s health. Interpretation of a gecko or gecko in a dream A gecko, a type of gecko. In the dream, an evil person appears who corrupts people with gossip, provocations, enmity and hatred among them, and teaches them evil and prevents them from doing good. It denotes poverty, sadness or humiliation. If he enters a sick person, he dies. Because it is poisonous and it is death. It symbolizes, in all its shapes and colors, a person who turns away from the people of truth, commands evil, and forbids good or good behavior. He is a person who is not well remembered by people. Al-Waz also indicates a person who sleeps a lot among people, which is corruption and a lot of oppression against people. It indicates the enemy. The one who speaks badly is the creep who likes to appear with your personal effort, and if you kill him, you will expose him and get rid of your relationship with him. Whoever sees that his stomach eats or eats the flesh of his hand or foot, or bites him or eats from any part of his flesh, then he will mistreat him and remind him of evil. The stomach indicates an evil opponent who confesses sins and obscene speech. Whoever sees that he is a leper will gain money. Whoever sees in his dream that he is a leper will receive a garment without adornment. Killing a goose in a dream indicates the end of evil or the end of something that will harm the dreamer. If it explodes in the body of the dreamer, he will be sick, and if the sting blows on the The dreamer's money, then he will be poor. Gagging in a dream indicates a problem that happens to the fortuneteller, and entering the stomach in the house is bad, and killing him is the end of this evil. Gagging in a dream may refer to the jinn or Satan. Because it is light and fast-moving, it can only be seen with difficulty, and it requires effort to kill it, and some of its types are poisonous. It is one of the symbols that may indicate magic and its demons. Because the fire of Abraham, peace be upon him, was struck, and lepers are not bad. Seeing geckos sometimes indicates that there is someone who secretly loves you. Weight in a dream can also indicate that you are ignoring people in the surroundings. Interpretation of geckos in a dream. Geckos or geckos are disgusting things and we all feel disgusted when we see them anywhere, and many of us fear them and stay away from them, so when one of us sees geckos in... The dream feels distressed and concerned and seeks to know what explains it. There is a consensus that seeing leprosy in a dream is hatred, because it indicates the presence of an enemy, injustice, gossip, corruption, and the corrupt. If a person dreams of leprosy in his dream, this means that there is an enemy who is interested in spreading evil, moving away from good, and calling for bad behavior. If a person dreams that he killed a leper in his dream, this means that this person was surrounded by someone who hated him and planned to kill him.

Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream for one girl. A snake bite in a dream for one girl is a warning to her that there are enemies in Her life, but thanks to God Almighty, she will be victorious. If the snake bites her left hand, this dream is very important. Because it warns her against actions that do not please God Almighty, and she must stand up for herself and hasten to repent before it is too late. Seeing a brown snake indicates that there is someone in her life. He is trying to deceive her. She must be very careful because he is trying to show her good morals. The black snake does not deserve praise in an unmarried woman’s dream, as it is a sign of serious matters and the dream warns her against dealing with others. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a green snake. Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream for a married woman when she sees A married woman sees a snake inside her house in a dream. It is considered a sign that there is someone who wants to destroy her marital life and wants to destroy it. Perhaps he has continued to do so and prays over it many times to keep God away from evil. The appearance of a snake in a married woman’s dream may be a sign of her suffering during this period of Anxiety and anxiety. Killing a snake in a dream for a married woman indicates that she is a wife in crisis with her partner. If the snake attacks her husband and kills him, she will receive kindness from God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream for a man and its meaningWhen a man dreams that he is killing a snake and then peeling its skin from her body, this The dream indicates that he will get rid of his enemy, God willing. Seeing a man killing a snake in a dream is a sign of marital disputes that will disappear until a point of understanding is reached. Fighting and killing a snake in a dream indicates the position that the person will take, which will lead to abundant profits, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about cutting a snake for a married woman. The meaning of seeing a snake in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. If a pregnant woman sees a snake in a dream, this may be a sign that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. The appearance of a snake in a pregnant woman’s dream could be a sign that she will have her period. Monthly. She will be filled with some problems that will rob her of the comfort that she will overcome, God willing. When she sees in her dream the black snake in a well, this dream is praiseworthy, indicating that her child will be surrounded by blessings, God willing. Killing the snake in a dream for a pregnant woman symbolizes the end of her period. The anxiety that occupied her and that the sorrows and pains will end. Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream for young people and its meaning. If a young man dreams that a black snake is chasing him. A warning to him about the woman who is trying to court him and does not have a good reputation, and God knows best. You may be interested in: Interpretation of dreams of a snake bite on the hand. Interpretation of a vision A snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a snake in a married man’s dream is a sign of the envy of his relatives. Anyone who causes marital problems should be careful and get the vaccination well. Not being afraid when a snake appears in a dream is a sign that this person

title: Interpretation of a dream about swimming in the sea for a single woman by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about swimming in the sea for a single woman: Many people love swimming, especially in the summer and when temperatures rise, it helps to enjoy time and calm the body, so the family can gather in the summer and swim or move to an area overlooking the sea to enjoy their time. . Sometimes a person can sleep by swimming, so what is the interpretation of a dream about swimming? Follow us. Today and until today, we will know what is the interpretation of dreams about swimming in the sea for single women, for married people, and pregnant women, and what is the interpretation of swimming in general. Follow us. Interpretation of a dream about swimming in general: Scientists interpreted swimming in general to mean that A person will fulfill a desire and this person will overcome difficult situations on his way. Swimming in a dream can also be interpreted as success in scientific and practical life and benefiting people. When a person sees that he is swimming in unclean water, this is an unpleasant dream, as it indicates that he is suffering from problems. He faces difficulties in his life, and God knows best. Click on the image to go to the store and complete the purchase. Interpretation of swimming in the sea: If a person sees that he is swimming in the sea, this indicates the fulfillment of his dreams and desires. If he sees that he is swimming in impure water, this indicates problems And anxiety. If one dreams that he is swimming and cannot swim, this indicates difficulties in his life. If one dreams that he is swimming on the beach or in the sand, this indicates problems and debts and may also indicate going to prison. Swimming in a calm sea in a dream: If A person dreams of performing ablution in the sea, this indicates his purity from sins and disobedience, and if an infidel dreams of swimming in the sea, this indicates his conversion to Islam, and God knows best. If a person dreams that he is swimming in the sea and it is calm, then this indicates happiness and stability in his life. And whoever thinks that he is urinating in the sea, then this indicates that he is urinating in the sea. A bad dream, it is an indication of sins and disobedience. If the dreamer is married and dreams that he is swimming in the sea, this indicates his happiness and stability and that he has a relationship with his wife full of love and affection. Other interpretations of swimming in a dream: If a person dreams that he is swimming with several people and these People are skilled at swimming, this means that the dreamer’s goals and aspirations will be achieved quickly and easily. If someone sees that he is swimming with a boss or an official, this means that he has obtained a prestigious position. Whoever dreams that he is swimming with a group of people who are not fit and he is the only one who is fit, this indicates On difficulties, anxiety, insomnia, and religion. Swimming in the sea and reaching the shore indicates salvation from dangers. If a person dreams that he is swimming on his back, this indicates his repentance and turning away from sins. If a girl dreams of a rough sea, this indicates the presence of a husband. If a person dreams of a sea Restless, this indicates problems that one may face. If a person dreams that he is swimming at night and is proficient, this indicates knowledge, jurisprudence, and his salvation from enemies. Interpretation of a dream about swimming in the sea for a single woman and what are its interpretations: In general, swimming for an unmarried girl indicates her life Emotional: If an unmarried girl dreams

If a person dreams that he is swimming in the sea and it is calm, then this indicates happiness and stability in his life. And whoever thinks that he is urinating in the sea, then this indicates that he is urinating in the sea. A bad dream, it is an indication of sins and disobedience. If the dreamer is married and dreams that he is swimming in the sea, this indicates his happiness and stability and that he has a relationship with his wife full of love and affection. Other interpretations of swimming in a dream: If a person dreams that he is swimming with several people and these People are skilled at swimming, this means that the dreamer’s goals and aspirations will be achieved quickly and easily. If someone sees that he is swimming with a boss or an official, this means that he has obtained a prestigious position. Whoever dreams that he is swimming with a group of people who are not fit and he is the only one who is fit, this indicates On difficulties, anxiety, insomnia, and religion. Swimming in the sea and reaching the shore indicates salvation from dangers. If a person dreams that he is swimming on his back, this indicates his repentance and turning away from sins. If a girl dreams of a rough sea, this indicates the presence of a husband. If a person dreams of a sea Restless, this indicates problems that one may face. If a person dreams that he is swimming at night and is proficient, this indicates knowledge, jurisprudence, and his salvation from enemies.
